===============

### Advance Contract Award Notice
#### Analysis of ages of Pleistocene to Holocene volcanic rock samples

*Publication Date:* 23 February 2023
*Tender Closing Date:* 9 March 2023 at 14:00 EST
*Tender Status:* Expired

#### Description:

The Department of Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) requires a contractor to analyze the ages of 47 Pleistocene to Holocene volcanic rock samples through Argon-Argon (Ar-Ar) dating, in support of the Volcano Risk Reduction in Canada project. The contractor will engage in the following activities:

* Sample preparation, including crushing and sieving, as necessary
* Argon-Argon dating, comprising:
	+ Irradiation of purified samples
	+ Laser fusion analysis of single crystals
	+ Whole rock analysis
* Return of remaining solid samples and pulps to NRCan
* Electronic delivery of analysis results to NRCan

#### Technical Requirements:

The procurement category is SRV (Services Related to the Construction of Buildings and Engineering Structures), with no specific UNSPSC codes assigned. The notice type is an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN).
